thread.title: Samhain Publishing celebrates its tenth anniversary
thread.title_full: Samhain Publishing celebrates its tenth anniversary - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Samhain Publishing celebrates its tenth anniversary
text:
Samhain Publishing
Reader- and author-themed promotions mark ten years as a digital-first fiction pioneer
CINCINNATI , Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- International publisher Samhain Publishing® is celebrating its tenth anniversary this November as a pioneering e-book publisher-and one with proven staying power. Since its founding in 2005, the publisher has released more than 3,000 titles in the U.S. and overseas and has published translations of its most popular works in countries such as Germany , Italy , Poland , Thailand-and many more.
To take part in Samhain Publishing's month-long celebration, win reader gifts and more, visit the publisher online at: https://www.samhainpublishing.com/promo/anniversary10
"Our focus has always been on our readers," explains Samhain owner and publisher Christina Brashear . "From the beginning, we have sought to publish the best stories in the industry, told by awesome story-tellers, while making those stories available in every sales channel possible for the convenience of our readers."
The digital-first pioneer, a woman-owned business, now publishes e-book and print books simultaneously for its romance and horror lines, and introduces past print favorites to a new digital readership with its Retro-Romance® imprint. With six to seven new releases each week, Samhain also features more than 600 authors in its list-from fan favorites to award winners to exciting new voices.
Some milestones in the company's ten-year career:
Publisher for 34 USA Today and 34 NYT bestselling authors, including such bestsellers as Maya Banks , Lorelei James , Jayne Rylon, Jenna Bayley-Burke , Vivian Arend , Lexxie Couper and Dana Marie Bell Publisher of breakout LGBT titles by popular authors such as A.M. Arthur , Ally Blue , Heidi Cullinan and J.L. Merrow First-ever publisher to utilize the "buy the book, not the format" concept, giving readers access to their books purchased from the Samhain store in all digital formats--.mobi, .epub and more. Advertising expansion into multi-media venues such as the New York Times Square Jumbotron, and featured in magazines such as Cosmopolitan , Marie-Claire , Oprah Magazine, and Martha Stewart Living To buy books and sign up for promotional discounts, visit Samhain Publishing online at www.SamhainPublishing.com . To contact the organization about collaborations or business opportunities, email Samhain at marketing@samhainpublishing.com .
About Samhain Publishing
Samhain Publishing® is an international publisher of ebook and traditional print fiction. An acknowledged expert in digital publishing since its founding in 2005, Samhain is dedicated to ensuring extraordinary stories reach every reader. Visit Samhain Publishing online at www.samhainpublishing.com .
CONTACT: Jenn Stark , 513-774-6020, jstark@samhainpublishing.com
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151023/280165
